com.stms.web

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stms.web.Course

  • public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
    Course class for Student Time Management System Used to manage associated CourseSession and CourseAssignment objects, and to determine overall course grade.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Course()
      Blank constructor used to create and insert new course records in the database.
      Course(int courseID)
      Parameterised constructor used to create and fetch an existing course from the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Delete the course's details from the database, along with all sessions and assignments related to it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Course

        public Course()
        Blank constructor used to create and insert new course records in the database.

      • Course

        public Course(int courseID)
       throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameterised constructor used to create and fetch an existing course from the database. Loads all associated course sessions into memory.
        Parameters:
        courseID - the course's unique ID in the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        public boolean save()
        Save the course's details to the database.
        Returns:

      • delete

        public boolean delete()
        Delete the course's details from the database, along with all sessions and assignments related to it.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise.
